com.percussion.publisher.server
Class PSPublisherHandlerResponse

java.lang.Object
  com.percussion.publisher.server.PSPublisherHandlerResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.percussion.publisher.server.IPSDTDHandlerResponse
public class PSPublisherHandlerResponse
extends Object
implements com.percussion.publisher.server.IPSDTDHandlerResponse

This class encapsulates the publisher handler response XML document that is defined in the interface IPSDTDHandlerResponse. The document is created in the constructor itself.

Constructor Detail

PSPublisherHandlerResponse

public PSPublisherHandlerResponse()
Default constructor. Creates the empty XML document with DTD defined.

PSPublisherHandlerResponse

public PSPublisherHandlerResponse(String editionid)
Constructor that takes the editionid string. Creates the empty XML document with DTD defined and sets the editionid appropriately.

Parameters:
editionid - Edition ID for the response, must not be null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the argument is null.

response document DOM Document, nevel null.

IllegalArgumentException - if any of the the arguments is null.

setResponse

public void setResponse(String type,
                        String msg,
                        String code)
Method to set the response data for the response document.

Parameters:
type - type string for the response. Must not be null.
msg - for the response. Must not be null.
code - for the response. May be null or empty.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any of response type or message strings is null.

setStatus

public void setStatus(String index,
                      String count,
                      String msg,
                      String pageindex,
                      String clistname,
                      String editionname)
Method to set the publication status in the response document.

Parameters:
index - - the index of the currently running content list. The first list in the data gets index of 1 nad second one 2, etc. Must not be null.
count - - the total number od content lists in the Edition. Must not be null.
msg - - the status message. May be null or empty.
pageindex - - the index of the page currently being processed. Must not be null.
clistname - - the content list name currently being processed. Must not be null.
editionname - - the Edition name. Must not be null.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any of index or count strings is null.
